item.title: Anthropic 正在洽谈筹集高达 100 亿美元的新资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Anthropic 公司即将达成新一轮高达 100 亿美元的融资协议，这一融资额高于预期，也是迄今为止人工智能初创公司最大的一笔融资。【原文：Anthropic is nearing a deal to raise as much as $10 billion in a new round of funding, according to people familiar with the matter, a higher than expected sum and one of the largest megarounds to date for an artificial intelligence startup.】

item.title: 纽约证券交易所最新场馆抢占德克萨斯证券交易所先机
item.description: 纽约证券交易所已经说服了一大批德克萨斯州的上市公司将其股票在其位于本州的新前哨进行双重上市，从而在竞争对手德克萨斯证券交易所计划于明年推出之前巩固了其竞争地位。【原文：The New York Stock Exchange has already convinced a significant chunk of Texas public companies to dual-list their shares on its new outpost in their home state, shoring up its competitive position ahead of next year’s planned launch of the rival Texas Stock Exchange.】

item.title: 高盛举债 60 亿美元支持 Dayforce 收购案
item.description: 据知情人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. committed a $6 billion debt financing package to support Thoma Bravo’s acquisition of human resources software provider Dayforce Inc., according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行的马丁称信贷需求转向以瑞士为重点的银行
item.description: 瑞士国家银行副总裁安托万-马丁（Antoine Martin）表示，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）收购瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）引发了瑞士信贷市场的转变，推动了对国内银行的需求。【原文：The takeover of Credit Suisse by UBS Group AG has triggered a shift in the Swiss credit market, driving demand to domestically oriented banks, according to Swiss National Bank Vice President Antoine Martin.】

item.title: 评级下调后，Vanguard 引领哥伦比亚债券销售创纪录
item.description: 全球最大的资产管理公司之一先锋集团（Vanguard）管理的投资基金在哥伦比亚地方债券被降级为垃圾级后，引领了海外投资者在 7 月份创纪录地抛售这些债券。【原文：Investment funds managed by Vanguard, one of the world’s largest asset managers, led a record selloff of Colombian local bonds by offshore investors in July, after the notes were downgraded to junk.】

item.title: 墨西哥银行 8 月降息的原因是就业市场疲软和比索走强
item.description: 墨西哥央行以经济增长疲软、就业市场不景气和比索走强为由，决定在本月延长降息期限。【原文：Mexico’s central bank cited weak economic growth, a slack jobs market and a stronger peso in its decision to extend interest rates cuts this month.】

item.title: 私人信贷市场违约警告开始增多
item.description: 在 1.7 万亿美元的私人信贷市场上，违约警告开始堆积如山，促使至少一些分析师对华尔街最喜欢的赚钱工具之一存在的未被充分重视的风险表示担忧。【原文：Warnings on defaults are starting to pile up in the $1.7 trillion private credit market, prompting at least some analysts to raise concern about underappreciated risks in one of Wall Street’s favorite money spinners.】

item.title: 美国银行称自动驾驶汽车可提升保险公司盈利能力
item.description: 向自动驾驶汽车的转变对汽车保险业来说是一个巨大的未知数，但对美国银行公司的分析师来说，这将是一个潜在的金矿。【原文：The shift to autonomous vehicles represents a great unknown for the auto insurance industry, but to analysts at Bank of America Corp. it will be a potential goldmine.】

item.title: 通利在老奶奶基金获得 20 亿美元收益后准备推出两只新 ETF
item.description: 资产管理公司兼网络财经名人汤姆-李（Tom Lee）在其首款产品大受散户投资者欢迎并吸引了超过 20 亿美元的资产后，已申请推出两款新的交易所交易基金。【原文：Asset manager and online financial personality Tom Lee has filed to launch two new exchange-traded funds after his first product proved a smash hit with retail investors and pulled in more than $2 billion in assets.】

item.title: 经济自给自足是神话吗？
item.description:
记者兼作家朱棣文（Ben Chu）在《特朗普经济学》（Trumponomics）一书中解释了为什么各经济体，尤其是美国不应该认为全球化是理所当然的。【原文：

On Trumponomics, journalist and author Ben Chu explains why economies—and particularly the US—shouldn’t take globalization for granted.

】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰希望以 15 亿美元出售 HPS、Clearlake 和 Golub 的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Blue Owl Capital Inc. 预计将通过出售私人资产管理公司的少数股权组合筹集约 15 亿美元资金。【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc. is expected to raise about $1.5 billion through the sale of a portfolio of minority stakes in private asset managers, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 司法部将调查美联储库克，敦促将其免职
item.description: 司法部计划对美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）进行调查，一名高级官员在周四发出的一封信中向美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）通报了调查情况，并鼓励他将丽莎-库克免职。【原文：The Justice Department plans to investigate Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook, with a top official informing Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell of the probe and encouraging him to remove her from the board in a letter sent Thursday.】

item.title: 印度央行就印度适当的通胀目标征求反馈意见
item.description: 印度央行在明年 3 月进行审查之前，就适当的通胀目标征求了公众的反馈意见。【原文：India’s central bank has sought public feedback on what should be an appropriate inflation target ahead of a review due in March next year.】

item.title: 加州大学在特朗普抨击声中撤回 15 亿美元债券
item.description: 据一位熟悉此事的人士透露，加州大学已经搁置了原定于本周出售的 15 亿美元市政债券，这一决定是在该系统与特朗普政府就联邦资金问题争执不下的情况下做出的。【原文：The University of California has shelved a $1.5 billion municipal-bond sale that had been slated for this week, according to a person familiar with the matter, a decision that comes amid a fight between the system and the Trump administration over federal funding.】

item.title: 苹果将 TV+ 订阅价格提高 30%，至每月 13 美元
item.description: 苹果公司将其 TV+ 流媒体平台的包月价格提高了 30%，达到 13 美元，这是苹果公司推动从服务中获得更多收入的举措之一。【原文：Apple Inc. raised the monthly subscription price of its TV+ streaming platform by 30% to $13, part of a push to generate more revenue from services.】

item.title: 智利财政部长马里奥-马塞尔辞职，CNN 智利报道
item.description: 据 CNN 智利报道，智利财政部长马里奥-马塞尔（Mario Marcel）于周四辞职。当地电视台 Canal 13 称，他的决定是出于个人原因。【原文：Chile Finance Minister Mario Marcel resigned from his position on Thursday, CNN Chile reported. His decision was due to personal reasons, local television station Canal 13 said.】

item.title: 美联储主席哈马克表示，如果明天召开会议，她不会削减货币政策
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）表示，如果央行行长们明天做出政策决定，她不会支持降低利率。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said she wouldn’t support lowering interest rates if central bankers were making a policy decision tomorrow.】

item.title: 英国政府将控制桑吉夫-古普塔钢铁资产
item.description: 英国将接管桑吉夫-古普塔（Sanjeev Gupta）拥有的一家公司，此前债权人反对一项计划，该计划将使这位陷入困境的钢铁大亨保留对公司资产的控制权。【原文：The UK will take control of a firm owned by Sanjeev Gupta, after creditors objected to a plan that would have seen the beleaguered steel tycoon retain control the company’s assets.】

item.title: 康菲石油公司豪赌液化天然气，将 Sempra 收购交易额提高近一倍
item.description: 康菲石油公司（ConocoPhillips）正加大其对美国液化天然气未来的押注，该公司同意将从 Sempra 公司正在德克萨斯州扩建的出口工厂购买的燃料数量增加近一倍。【原文：ConocoPhillips is increasing its bet on the future of US liquefied natural gas through an agreement to nearly double the amount of fuel it will buy from an export plant Sempra is expanding in Texas.】

item.title: 日本与肯尼亚达成信贷协议，规模小于内罗毕最初宣传的规模
item.description: 日本同意向肯尼亚提供多达 250 亿日元（1.7 亿美元）的日元计价资金，这一数额低于内罗毕此前表示的预期。【原文：Japan agreed to provide Kenya with as much as ¥25 billion ($170 million) in yen-denominated funding, a smaller amount than Nairobi previously indicated it expected to secure.】

item.title: 为什么谷歌认为其 Pixel 手机的销量远大于其销售数字？
item.description:
搜索巨头探讨智能手机之外的人工智能世界。【原文：

The search giant discusses an AI-powered world beyond the smartphone.

item.title: 据称 SMG 最快将于下月在苏黎世首次公开募股 12 亿美元
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，房地产门户网站 ImmoScout24 的运营商 SMG Swissmarketplace Group AG 正在考虑在苏黎世进行首次公开募股，最快可能在下个月募集到约 10 亿瑞士法郎（约合 12 亿美元）的资金。【原文：SMG Swissmarketplace Group AG, the operator of property portal ImmoScout24, is considering an initial public offering in Zurich that could raise about 1 billion Swiss francs ($1.2 billion) as soon as next month, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 丝绸之路》为何历时七年制作完成
item.description:
这款备受期待的独立游戏已经制作了很长时间，以至于成为了网络流行语 

。【原文：

The highly anticipated indie game has been in production for so long that it’s become an internet meme 

】

item.title: 巴拿马财政数据降低评级为 "绩差 "的风险，巴拿马债券跳涨
item.description: 巴拿马主权债券的交易价格接近约一年来的最高点，原因是第二季度财政数据的改善提高了这个中美洲国家避免被降级为垃圾级的可能性。【原文：Panama’s sovereign bonds are trading near the highest in about a year as an improvement in second-quarter fiscal data raised the odds of the Central American nation skirting a downgrade to junk.】

item.title: 交易商寻求美联储信号，外汇波动率降至八月正常值以下
item.description: 今年 8 月，货币市场的波动性打破了历史规律，不仅没有出现通常的季节性反弹，反而降至一年来的最低点。【原文：Volatility in the currency market is breaking with historical patterns this August, sliding to the lowest in a year instead of staging a usual seasonal rebound.】

item.title: 价格增长放缓，美国现房销售上升
item.description: 由于价格增长放缓和抵押贷款利率走低，7 月份美国旧房销售量小幅上升，这有助于稳定需求。【原文：Sales of previously owned US homes rose modestly in July as price growth slowed and mortgage rates drifted lower, helping to stabilize demand.】

item.title: 美国制造业因需求而以 2022 年以来最快速度扩张
item.description: 美国制造业正以三年多来最快的速度扩张，原因是需求强劲，这也助长了持续的通胀压力。【原文：US manufacturing is expanding at the fastest rate in more than three years on stronger demand that's also fueling sustained inflationary pressures.】

item.title: 评级公司称 Braskem 正在耗尽最后的支持
item.description: 在长达数年的行业低迷和不断攀升的环境灾难成本中，石化公司 Braskem SA 一直有一个重要的救命稻草，那就是其巨额的现金储备。现在，就连这一支柱也被侵蚀殆尽。【原文：Throughout a years-long industry downturn and the spiraling cost of an environmental disaster, petrochemical company Braskem SA has had one major saving grace — its hefty cash reserves. Now, even that pillar of support is being eroded away.】

item.title: Blackstone 在电气化领域再下 16 亿美元赌注
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 已达成收购电气设备服务供应商 Shermco 的交易，这是其对电气化日益重要的作用的最新押注。【原文：Blackstone Inc. has struck a deal to acquire electrical equipment services provider Shermco in its latest bet on the increasingly critical role of electrification.】

item.title: 美国军方的神秘太空飞机可能地平线有限
item.description: 美国太空部队的 X-37B 号朦胧太空飞机正准备执行第八次漫长的轨道任务，但它在超级大国快速扩张的太空防御努力（如 "金顶 "计划）中所起的作用可能有限— 有翼飞船的未来尚不明确。【原文：As the US Space Force’s shadowy spaceplane, the X-37B, prepares for an eighth lengthy orbital mission, its role in the superpower’s fast-expanding space defense efforts such as Golden Dome may be limited — and the future of winged spacecraft is unclear.】
